1.3.2.en:
[#224](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/224) Fixed timeout error during adapter start in some special cases.
[#246](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/246) Fixed an issue that logged the same log entry multiple times.
[#210](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/210) Run integration tests against a virtual mock version of an KLF-200.
[#233](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/233) Fixed findings of Adapter Checker.
Upgrade dependencies
1.3.2.de:
[#224](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/224) Behobener Timeout-Fehler beim Adapterstart in einigen speziellen Fällen.
[#246](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/246) Es wurde ein Problem behoben, das den gleichen Log-Eintrag mehrfach protokolliert hat.
[#210](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/210) Integrationstests werden gegen eine virtuelle Mock-Version eines KLF-200 ausgeführt.
[#233](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/233) Ergebnisse des Adapter Checkers sind behoben.
Abhängigkeiten aktualisiert
1.3.2.ru:
[#224] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/224) Исправленная ошибка таймаута во время адаптера начинается в некоторых особых случаях.
[#246] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/246) Исправлена проблема, которая несколько раз регистрировала один и тот же вход.
[#210] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/210) Запустите интеграционные тесты против виртуальной версии KLF-200.
[#233] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/233) Исправленные результаты проверки адаптера.
Зависимость от повышения качества
1.3.2.pt:
[#224] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/224) O erro de tempo limite fixo durante o início do adaptador em alguns casos especiais.
[#246](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/246) Corrigido um problema que registrou a mesma entrada de log várias vezes.
[#210](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/210) Execute testes de integração contra uma versão virtual de um KLF-200.
[#233](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/233) Achados fixos do verificador do adaptador.
Dependências de atualização
1.3.2.nl:
[#224](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/224) Vaste timeout fout tijdens adapter start in sommige speciale gevallen.
[#246](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/246) Een probleem opgelost dat dezelfde log invoer meerdere keren logde.
[#210](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/210) Voer integratietests uit tegen een virtuele schijnversie van een KLF-200.
[#233](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/233) Vaste bevindingen van Adapter Checker.
Upgrade afhankelijkheden
1.3.2.fr:
[#224](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/224) Erreur de timeout corrigée pendant le démarrage de l'adaptateur dans certains cas particuliers.
[#246](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/246) Correction d'un problème qui a enregistré la même entrée de journal plusieurs fois.
[#210](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/210) Exécutez des tests d'intégration contre une version virtuelle simulée d'un KLF-200.
[#233] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/233) Correction des résultats de la vérification de l'adaptateur.
Amélioration des dépendances
1.3.2.it:
[#224](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/224) Errore di timeout fisso durante l'avvio dell'adattatore in alcuni casi speciali.
[#246](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/246) Risolto un problema che ha registrato la stessa voce di registro più volte.
[#210](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/210) Eseguire test di integrazione contro una versione virtuale mock di un KLF-200.
[#233](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/233) Risultati fissi di Adattatore Checker.
Dipendenze di aggiornamento
1.3.2.es:
[#224](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/224) Error de tiempo fijo durante el inicio del adaptador en algunos casos especiales.
[#246](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/246) Arregló un problema que registró la misma entrada de registro varias veces.
[#210](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/210) Ejecute pruebas de integración contra una versión virtual de un KLF-200.
[#233](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/233) Conclusiones fijas de Adapter Checker.
Aumentar las dependencias
1.3.2.pl:
[# 224] (https: / / github.com / MiSchroe / ioBroker.klf200 / issues / 224) Naprawiono błąd timeout podczas uruchamiania adaptera w niektórych szczególnych przypadkach.

[#224](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/products/224) Виправлена помилка часу при запуску адаптера в деяких спеціальних випадках.
[#246](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/products/246) Виправлено проблему, що ввійшло той самий запис журналу кілька разів.
[#210](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/products/210) Тести з інтеграції Run на віртуальну версію KLF-200.
[#233](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/products/233) Виправлені результати перевірки адаптера.

1.3.1.en:
[#214](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/214) Fixed error while retrieving the version number of the klf-200-api package.
[#215](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/215) Added a device manager tab to the settings dialog for managing devices, groups and scenes.
[#217](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/217) Refresh statusReply after reading the limitations to show correct values.
[#218](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/218) Refresh runStatus after reading the limitations to show correct values.

1.3.0.en:
[#180](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/180) Fixed handling new product detection.
[#47](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/47), [#113](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/113) Support limitations (e.g. rain sensor)
[#209](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/209) Support of [ioBroker.device-manager](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.device-manager) for managing products, groups and scenes.
Fix missing removal of event handlers.
Upgrade dependencies, min. Node version 18.x, min. js-controller 5.x.
Added stricter linting rules and fixed findings.
1.3.0.de:
[#180](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/180) Behobene Handhabung neuer Produktdetektion.
[#47](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/47), [#113](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/113) Support-Beschränkungen (z.B. Regensensor)
[#209](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/209) Unterstützung von [ioBroker.device-manager](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.device-manager) für die Verwaltung von Produkten, Gruppen und Szenen.
Fix fehlende Entfernung von Event-Handlern.
Upgrade-Abhängigkeiten, min. Node Version 18.x, min. js-controller 5.x.
Es wurden strengere Regeln und feste Befunde hinzugefügt.
1.3.0.ru:
[#180] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/180) Исправлена обработка нового обнаружения продукта.
[#47] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/47), [#113] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/113) Ограничения поддержки (например, датчик дождя)
[#209] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/209) Поддержка [ioBroker.device-manager] (https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.device-Manager) для управления продуктами, группами и сценами.
Исправление недостающего удаления обработчиков событий.
Улучшенные зависимости, мин. Node version 18.x, min. js-controller 5.x.
Добавлены более строгие правила и фиксированные выводы.
1.3.0.pt:
[#180](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/180) Manipulação fixa nova detecção de produtos.
[#47](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/47), [#113](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/113) Limitações de suporte (por exemplo, sensor de chuva)
[#209](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/209) Apoio do [ioBroker.device-manager](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.device-manager) para a gestão de produtos, grupos e cenas.
Corrigir a remoção falta de manipuladores de eventos.
Atualize dependências, min. Node versão 18.x, min. js-controller 5.x.
Adicionado regras de forro mais rígidas e achados fixos.
1.3.0.nl:
[#180](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/180) Vaste behandeling van nieuwe productdetectie.
[#47](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/47), [#113](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/113) Ondersteuningsbeperkingen (bv. regensensor)
[#209](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/209) Ondersteuning van [ioBroker.device-manager](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.device-manager) voor het beheer van producten, groepen en scènes.
Repareer ontbrekende verwijdering van de event handlers.
Upgrade afhankelijkheden min. Node versie 18.x, min. js-controller 5.x.
Toegevoegd strengere regels en vaste bevindingen.
1.3.0.fr:
[#180](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/180) Gestion fixe de la détection de nouveaux produits.
[#47](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/47), [#113](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/113) Limites de support (par exemple capteur de pluie)
[#209](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/209) Soutien de [ioBroker.device-manager](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.device-manager) pour la gestion des produits, des groupes et des scènes.
Correction du retrait manquant des gestionnaires d'événements.
Améliorer les dépendances, min. Node version 18.x, min. js-controller 5.x.
Ajout de règles plus strictes et de conclusions fixes.
1.3.0.it:
[#180](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/180) Gestione fissa nuova rilevazione del prodotto.
[#47](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/47), [#113](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/113) Limitazioni di supporto (ad esempio sensore pioggia)
[#209](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/209) Supporto di [ioBroker.device-manager](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.device-manager) per la gestione di prodotti, gruppi e scene.
Fissare la rimozione mancante dei gestori di eventi.
Dipendenze di aggiornamento, min. Nodo versione 18.x, min. js-controller 5.x.
Aggiunta regole più rigorose e risultati fissi.
1.3.0.es:
[#180](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/180) Manejo fijo nueva detección de productos.
[#47](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/47), [#113](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/113) Limitaciones de soporte (por ejemplo, sensor de lluvia)
[#209](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/209) Support of [ioBroker.device-manager](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.device-manager) for managing products, groups and scenes.
Arregla la eliminación perdida de los manipuladores del evento.
Dependeciones de actualización, min. Nodo versión 18.x, min. js-controller 5.x.
Añadido reglas de forro más estrictas y hallazgos fijos.
1.3.0.pl:
[# 180] (https: / / github.com / MiSchroe / ioBroker.klf200 / issues / 180) Stała obsługa nowego wykrywania produktów.
[# 47] (https: / / github.com / MiSchroe / ioBroker.klf200 / issues / 47), [# 113] (https: / / github.com / MiSchroe / ioBroker.klf200 / issues / 113) Ograniczenia wsparcia (np. czujnik deszczu)
[# 209] (https: / / github.com / MiSchroe / ioBroker.klf200 / issues / 209) Wsparcie [ioBroker.device- manager] (https: / / www.npmjs.com / package / iobroker.device- manager) dla zarządzania produktami, grupami i sceną.

[#180](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/products/180) Виправлена обробка нових продуктів.
[#47](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/47), [#113](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/products/113) Обмеження підтримки (наприклад, датчик дощу)

[#180] (https://github.com/Mischroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/180) (中文(简体) ). 固定处理新产品检测.
[47] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/47),[113] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/113). 支持限制(如雨传感器)
[209] (https://github.com/Mischroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/209) (中文(简体) ). 支持[ioBroker.device-manager](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroster.device-manager)管理产品,团体和场景.
修复事件处理器缺失的处理器 .
升级依赖关系,分钟。 节点版本18.x,min.js-controller 5.x.
增加了更严格的贴身规则和固定裁定.

1.2.0.en:
[#126](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/126) Fixed Adapter-Checker warning.
[#124](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/124) Added help message for password in configuration dialog.
[#106](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/106) Fixed an unhandled rejection exception.
[#135](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/135) Fixed warning for Admin settings.
[#137](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/137) Fixed Github Workflows.
[#40](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/40) The scene list can be refreshed.
[#129](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/129) The state targetPositionRaw is writable to support additional scenarios.
[#133](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/133) Added a refreshProduct state to manually refresh the state of a product.
1.2.0.de:
[#126](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/126) Fixed Adapter-Checker Warnung.
[#124](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/124) Hilfenachricht für Passwort im Konfigurationsdialog hinzugefügt.
[#106](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/106) Eine unhandled Ablehnung Ausnahme.
[#135](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/135) Feste Warnung für Admin-Einstellungen.
[#137](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/137) Github Workflows wurden behoben.
[#40](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/40) Die Szenenliste kann erfrischt werden.
[#129](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/129) Das State TargetPositionRaw kann zusätzliche Szenarien unterstützen.
[#133](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/133) Hinzugefügt ein RefreshProduktzustand, um den Zustand eines Produkts manuell zu aktualisieren.
1.2.0.ru:
[#126] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/126) Настоящее предупреждение Адаптер-Кекер.
[#124] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/124) Добавлено сообщение справки для пароля в диалоге настройки.
[#106] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/106) Исправлено безошибочное исключение.
[#135] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/135) Исправленное предупреждение для Настройки Админа.
[#137] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/137) Fixed Github Workflows.
[#40] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/40) Список сцены можно обновить.
[#129] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/129) Государственная целеваяPositionRaw может поддерживать дополнительные сценарии.
[#133] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/133) Добавлено состояние освежителя, чтобы вручную освежить состояние продукта.
1.2.0.pt:
[#126](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/126) Alerta Fixed Adapter-Checker.
[#124] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/124) Adicionado mensagem de ajuda para senha na caixa de diálogo de configuração.
[#106](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/106) Corrigido uma exceção de rejeição sem manuseamento.
[#135] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/135)) Aviso fixo para configurações de administrador.
[#137] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/137) Fluxos de trabalho do Github fixos.
[#40](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/40) A lista de cena pode ser atualizada.
[#129](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/129) O State targetPositionRaw é possível suportar cenários adicionais.
[#133](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/133) Adicionado um estado refrescarProduto para atualizar manualmente o estado de um produto.
1.2.0.nl:
[#126](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/126) Fixed Adapter-Checker waarschuwing.
[#124](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/124) Hulpbericht toegevoegd voor wachtwoord in configuratiedialoog.
[#106](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/106) Een ongemanierde afwijzingsuitzondering.
[#135](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/135) Vaste waarschuwing voor beheerdersinstellingen.
[#137](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/137) Vaste Github workflows.
[#40](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/40) De scènelijst kan worden opgefrist.
[#129](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/129) De staat doelPositionRaw is schrijfbaar om extra scenario's te ondersteunen.
[#133](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/133) Toegevoegd een refreshProduct status om handmatig de staat van een product te vernieuwen.
1.2.0.fr:
[#126](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/126) Avertissement fixe de l'adaptateur-vérificateur.
[#124](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/124) Ajout du message d'aide pour le mot de passe dans la boîte de dialogue de configuration.
[#106](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/106) Correction d'une exception de rejet non traitée.
[#135](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/135) Avertissement corrigé pour les paramètres d'Admin.
[#137](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/137) Flux de travail Github corrigés.
[#40](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/40) La liste des scènes peut être mise à jour.
[#129](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/129) La cible de l'étatPositionRaw est susceptible de supporter des scénarios supplémentaires.
[#133](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/133) Ajout d'un état de rafraîchissement pour rafraîchir manuellement l'état d'un produit.
1.2.0.it:
[#126](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/126) Avvertenza Adattatore-Checker fisso.
[#124](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/124) Aggiunto messaggio di aiuto per la password nella finestra di dialogo di configurazione.
[#106](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/106) Risolto un'eccezione di rifiuto non maneggiata.
[#135](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/135) Avvertenza fissa per le impostazioni di amministrazione.
[#137](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/137) Flussi di lavoro fissi Github.
[#40](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/40) La lista della scena può essere rinfrescata.
[#129](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/129) Il target di statoPositionRaw è scrivibile per supportare scenari aggiuntivi.
[#133](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/133) Aggiunto uno stato di aggiornamentoProduct per aggiornare manualmente lo stato di un prodotto.
1.2.0.es:
[#126](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/126) Advertencia de Adaptador fijo.
[#124](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/124) Añadido mensaje de ayuda para contraseña en el diálogo de configuración.
[#106](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/106) Arregló una excepción de rechazo sin manejar.
[#135](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/135) Advertencia fija para la configuración de Admin.
[#137](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/137) Flujos de trabajo de Github fijos.
[#40](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/40) La lista de escena se puede refrescar.
[#129](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/129) El objetivo estatalPositionRaw es obligatorio para apoyar escenarios adicionales.
[#133](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/133) Se agregó un estado refrescante producto para refrescar manualmente el estado de un producto.

1.2.0.zh-cn:
[#126] (https://github.com/Mischroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/126) (中文(简体) ). 固定适配器-检查器警告.
[#124] (https://github.com/Mischroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/124) (中文(简体) ). 在配置对话框中添加密码的帮助消息 .

1.1.1.en: (Michael Schroeder) Support functional parameters to control e.g. speed, horizontal awning etc.
1.1.1.de: (Michael Schroeder) Unterstützung funktionaler Parameter zur Steuerung von z.B. Geschwindigkeit, horizontaler Markise usw.
1.1.1.ru: (Michael Schroeder) Поддержка функциональных параметров для управления, например. скорость, горизонтальный тент и т. д.
1.1.1.pt: (Michael Schroeder) Suporta parâmetros funcionais para controlar, por ex. velocidade, toldo horizontal etc.
1.1.1.nl: (Michael Schroeder) Ondersteun functionele parameters om b.v. snelheid, horizontale luifel enz.
1.1.1.fr: (Michael Schroeder) Prise en charge des paramètres fonctionnels pour contrôler par ex. vitesse, auvent horizontal, etc.
1.1.1.it: (Michael Schroeder) Supporta i parametri funzionali per controllare ad es. velocità, tenda orizzontale ecc.
1.1.1.es: (Michael Schroeder) Admite parámetros funcionales para controlar, p. velocidad, toldo horizontal, etc.
1.1.1.pl: (Michael Schroeder) Wsparcie parametrów funkcjonalnych do sterowania m.in. prędkość, markiza pozioma itp.
1.1.1.uk: (Michael Schroeder) Підтримка функціональних параметрів для керування, напр. швидкість, горизонтальний тент тощо.
1.1.1.zh-cn: (Michael Schroeder) 支持功能参数来控制，例如速度、水平遮阳篷等

1.0.1.en: (Michael Schroeder) Fix [#49](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/49) Set multiple states at once, e.g. in Blockly
1.0.1.de: (Michael Schroeder) Fix [# 49] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/49) Mehrere Zustände gleichzeitig festlegen, z. in Blockly
1.0.1.ru: (Michael Schroeder) Исправление [# 49] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/49) Установка нескольких состояний одновременно, например, в блоке
1.0.1.pt: (Michael Schroeder) Correção [# 49] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/49) Defina vários estados ao mesmo tempo, por exemplo em Blockly
1.0.1.nl: (Michael Schroeder) Fix [# 49] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/49) Stel meerdere toestanden tegelijk in, b.v. in Blockly
1.0.1.fr: (Michael Schroeder) Correction [# 49] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/49) Définissez plusieurs états à la fois, par ex. à Blockly
1.0.1.it: (Michael Schroeder) Correzione [# 49] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/49) Impostare più stati contemporaneamente, ad es. in Blockly
1.0.1.es: (Michael Schroeder) Solución [# 49] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/49) Establezca varios estados a la vez, p. en Blockly
1.0.1.pl: (Michael Schroeder) Napraw [# 49] (https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/49) Ustaw wiele stanów naraz, np. w Blockly
1.0.1.zh-cn: （Michael Schroeder）修复[＃49]（https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/49）一次设置多个状态，例如在块状
1.0.1.uk: (Michael Schroeder) Виправити [#49](https://github.com/MiSchroe/ioBroker.klf200/issues/49) Встановити кілька станів одночасно, напр. в Блоклі

desc.en: Controls products and scenes connected to a KLF-200 interface
desc.de: Steuert Produkte und Szenen, die an eine KLF-200-Schnittstelle angeschlossen sind
desc.ru: Управляет продуктами и сценами, подключенными к интерфейсу KLF-200
desc.pt: Controla produtos e cenas conectadas a uma interface KLF-200
desc.nl: Bestuurt producten en scènes die zijn aangesloten op een KLF-200-interface
desc.fr: Contrôle des produits et des scènes connectés à une interface KLF-200
desc.it: Controlla i prodotti e le scene connesse a un'interfaccia KLF-200
desc.es: Controla productos y escenas conectadas a una interfaz KLF-200
desc.pl: Kontroluje produkty i sceny podłączone do interfejsu KLF-200
desc.zh-cn: 控制连接到KLF-200接口的产品和场景
desc.uk: Керує продуктами та сценами, підключеними до інтерфейсу KLF-200
